content.prompt: Which of the following historical continuities is best reflected in the image?

choices.label: Chinese art reflected European methods of painting.
Chinese art continued to emphasize traditional subjects and styles.
Chinese art incorporated elements of Central Asian nomadic life.
Chinese art continued to stress the importance of technological innovation.

topic.text: 1.1: Developments in East Asia from c. 1200 to c. 1450

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
